description: Add color attribute, type attribute, and children/content support
custom_content_template: {% if showIcon == 'before' %}{% endif %}{{ children if children else label | safe }}{% if showIcon == 'after' %}{% endif %}
notes: Base RVO button uses 'kind' prop for styling variants
Added 'color' attribute to allow custom color overrides with full RVO palette
Added 'type' attribute with default 'button' to prevent accidental form submissions
Button content: renders children if provided, otherwise falls back to label attribute
Icons are conditionally rendered before/after content based on showIcon attribute
